name: Cosmo-Jumper
description:
This game is a 2D platformer where you need to collect two jewels from an alien ship to repair your own and make it back to planet Earth.

Created by Mathew Armstrong while on a Coursera course called "Game Development and Design" by Michigan State University.

From the original project, I have made the following changes:

  • Designed two complete levels and linked them.
  • The second level is lengthy and requires getting a few keys to complete the level.
  • The UI has been adapted to end the game with a short message.
